items.name: Nube Burger with Sichuan Pepper Beef
items.description: A mini cloud-like burger with tender beef and a hint of Sichuan pepper for a mildly spicy kick.

items.description: Crispy ravioli filled with cheese, drizzled with truffle-infused honey for a sweet and earthy flavor.

items.description: Tender lamb skewers served with a sweet and spicy curry and mango sauce for a unique flavor blend.

items.description: Small tortillas with a rich black truffle cream.
